title: Justice Rohit B Deo of Bombay High Court resigns, announces decision in open court
selftext: Last year, Justice Rohit B Deo passed an order acquitting Delhi University professor G N Saibaba who was sentenced to life imprisonment for alleged Maoist links. He also recently stayed a GR pertaining to illegal excavation by contractors of the Samruddhi Expressway.
